entry.title: Saturday night: A few flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 60 near midnight. Low minus 1. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Clearing. High plus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Clearing near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening with 60 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 1. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 7:55 PM EDT Saturday 25 March 2023
